item.description:
Directions to Christopher's,
1920 Mass Avenue, Cambridge, MA 02140

http://www.christophe...


http://maps.google.co...

Christopher?s is located right next to the Porter Square T stop. There is also plenty of parking available in the area (check the mall across the street.). I hope you will join us for food, drink, friends and Alfresco.

617-834-2781
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs -- Ask the Host for Alfresco Group!
